plot: God's Beach is a meditative look at a young girl's life over 48 hours, and how the cyclical forces of life and death cause her to mature and grow.
title: God's Beach
plot_es: God's Beach is a meditative look at a young girl's life over 48 hours, and how the cyclical forces of life and death cause her to mature and grow.
plot_en: God's Beach is a meditative look at a young girl's life over 48 hours, and how the cyclical forces of life and death cause her to mature and grow.
